Class Walls

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Walls
  • public class Walls
extends greenfoot.Actor
    This is the class for the walls that I use in the game It allows you to add in new walls with parameters to select the length and rotation
    Version:
    2019/11/16
    Author:
    Dante Romey

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Walls​(int length, int rotation)
      Creates the image for the wall and scales it using the length param.
